name: Parkour Sprinter
description:
Parkour Sprinter

Jump and dash your way through a randomly generated terrain of obstacles as you test your reflexes and timing in this thrilling casual platformer!

Try to beat your high score as you train your senses!

Beta Version

Please note that the game is currently in beta version. However, you can try out the latest iteration of the game through the download below!

Simply unzip the file and begin playing.

Track the game's progress

To keep up to date with the game's progress, follow us on Twitter and Instagram:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TrollgenStudios

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/trollgen_studios/
